name: Snork
description:
Guide Snork through an intricate world of labyrinths and changing paths.

Snork is a surreal exploration through fantastical structures and impossible geometries.
Guide Snork through the mysterious structures, uncovering hidden paths, and unfolding optical illusions.

Inspired by the art of 3D optical illusions , every puzzle is a unique, hand-crafted structure to explore.

EASY TO USE

With simple controls designed to be easy for everyone to pick up, enjoy and complete.


*** NO ADS OR IN-APP PURCHASING! ***
